original_text: And thou shalt have a paddle upon thy weapon; and it shall be, when thou wilt ease thyself abroad, thou shalt dig therewith, and shalt turn back and cover that which cometh from thee:
korean_text: 네 기구에 작은 삽을 더하여 밖에 나가서 대변을 볼 때에 그것으로 땅을 팔 것이요 몸을 돌려 그 배설물을 덮을지니

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt have a paddle upon thy weapon;
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 무기 위에 삽을 가질 것이며

sentences.original_text: when thou wilt ease thyself abroad,
and cover that which cometh from thee:
